title: Celebrity
description: They were princes...The royalty of their 1950 high school graduating class--three promising young men who were, without a doubt, most likely to succeed. And they did succeed.In films, in journalism and in charismatic religion, they reached that dazzling, dangerous pinnacle called CELEBRITY...only to be haunted by memories of a dark night of violence and a shared secret guilt that could destroy them all.
author: Thomas Thompson
